scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Once Upon a Pond (1973) series contains the manuscript and revisions of the second children's book by A.B. Guthrie, Jr. It features Maggie Magpie, Mephitis Skunk, Busy Beaver, and the other animal inhabitants of Pond Placid. The book was orginally published by Mountain Press Publishing Company and illustrated by Carol B. Guthrie.
